errors.generic: Amazon Pay is currently not available. Please contact the shop operator for further information.
errors.insecure: Amazon Pay is not available for HTTP. Please contact the shop operator for further information or instructions.
errors.invalidShippingMethod: Amazon Pay is currently not available. Please check the selected shipping method and try again.
errors.finalize: An error occurred while processing the payment. Please contact the shop operator or retry.
errors.loginWithAmazon: An error occurred while trying to login with Amazon. Please create a new shop account or retry several minutes later.
errors.signupTokenInvalid: There was an error validating your permission to sign up with Amazon Pay.
errors.signupEmailNotUnique: A customer with that Email address is already registered. Did you forget your password?
errors.accountAlreadyLinked: An account is already linked with your Amazon account.

register.headline: Are you an Amazon customer?
register.text: Skip the manual input by using the address and client information stored in your Amazon account.

purePaymentRedirect.text: You will automatically be redirected to Amazon Pay. Please don't leave this page.
